original: Bergius, Arvid Edvard, poistmästa-re, Kungsbacka, f. 17/12/82 i Strömstad av postmäst. Johan B. o. Ada Smith. G. 16 m. Lisa Wieslander. — Stud. v. Gbgs h. latiinlärov. E. o. postexp. i västra distr. 01, e. bitr. i Svanesund 03, v. järnv iposten i västra distr. 04, i Gbg 07, postexp. där s. å., postassist. 25, förste postassist. i Lid-kiöp. 28, p0’stmäst. i Kungsbacka sed. 31. GMnr.
translated: Bergius, Arvid Edvard, postmaster, from Kungsbacka, born on December 17th, 1882 in Strömstad to postmaster Johan B. and Ada Smith. He married Lisa Wieslander in 1916. - He studied at Gothenburg's high school and worked as a clerk and postal worker in various districts from 1901. He worked as an assistant in Svanesund in 1903, at the railway post office in the western district in 1904, and in the Gothenburg post office in 1907. In 1925, he became a postal assistant and in 1928, the first postal assistant in Lidköping. He became the postmaster in Kungsbacka in 1931. GMnr. (Note: GMnr. is an abbreviation for an unknown reference or source.)

employmentHistory.title: Railway Post Office in western district
